testing-strategies.no-mocking: Avoid using mocking frameworks like Mockito to ensure that tests interact with real implementations, providing more accurate validation of the cache behavior.
testing-strategies.realistic-load-testing: Incorporate realistic load testing scenarios that simulate actual usage patterns to better assess performance and scalability under expected conditions, test with 100.000 concurrent requests.

deliverables-enhancements.detailed-benchmark-reports: Expand performance benchmarking deliverables to include detailed reports with graphs and analysis of response time improvements, hit rates, and resource utilization under various load conditions.
deliverables-enhancements.example-application: Include a sample application that demonstrates the integration and usage of the cache library in a real-world scenario, showcasing typical usage patterns and performance benefits.
